# downloading

**Type Property**

A status value that indicates that the system is currently downloading the asset pack.

## Declaration

```swift
static let downloading: AssetPack.Status
```

## Tracking downloads

- **downloadAvailable**: A status value that indicates that the asset pack is available to download.
- **downloaded**: A status value that indicates that the system finished downloading the asset pack.

items.description: A status value that indicates that the asset pack is available to download.
items.name: downloadAvailable

items.description: A status value that indicates that the system finished downloading the asset pack.
